name: Ball Eater (Akrotag)
description:
Welcome to Ball Eater, the goal is to eat as much balls as you can as fast as possbile.

To move your cube, you need to hold your mouse click and release it in the direction in which you want the cube to go.

Downloading a build for your OS rather than playing on the web is reccomended.

Game made for the ScoreSpace Jam 14, my interpretation of the theme "merge" was that the cube grows when they eat a ball, or merge with the balls, I then added a timer to add a bit to the "challenge" of eating as much balls as fast as possible.
